actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the State Community College of East St. Louis.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education to relieve the State Community College of East Saint Louis and any past or present member of the board of trustees of such college of all liability relating to a specified misappropriation of funds by an official of such college, exceeding sums paid or due prior to the date of enactment of this Act under a specified agreement.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the State Community College of East St. Louis.
